messages.title: A LABOUR GOVERNMENT WILL:
messages.content: Restore the pensions link with earnings, Protect Sure Start, and provide free childcare, Establish a 'People's Bank' at the Post Office, Introduce a fully elected House of Lords and hold a referendum on Proportional Representation, Create 400,000 new green jobs by 2015 and protect food producers from the competitive practices of major supermarkets, Introduce a global tax on banks so they contribute fairly to the society in which they are based

messages.title: A LABOUR COUNCIL WILL:
messages.content: Stop selling council housing to property speculators and end the privatisation of caretakers, Cut Camden's carbon emissions by 40% by 2020, Introduce a London Living Wage and freeze pay for the 26 council staff paid more than £100k, Fund new football pitches for Camden schools and teams, Establish a network of community Gardening clubs, Build a school south of Euston and challenge unfair cuts to primary schools.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Create 400,000 new green jobs by 2015 and protect food producers from the competitive practices of major supermarkets.
Stop selling council housing to property speculators and end the privatisation of caretakers.
Cut Camden's carbon emissions by 40% by 2020.
Introduce a London Living Wage and freeze pay for the 26 council staff paid more than £100k.
Fund new football pitches for Camden schools and teams, Build a school south of Euston and challenge unfair cuts to primary schools.

Restore the pensions link with earnings, Protect Sure Start, and provide free childcare, Establish a 'People's Bank' at the Post Office, Introduce a fully elected House of Lords and hold a referendum on Proportional Representation.
Introduce a global tax on banks so they contribute fairly to the society in which they are based.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: David Cameron, Boris Johnson, Nick Clegg
mentions.tacticalSituation: Tories and Lib Dems share power in Camden and 17 other councils. Voting Lib Dem risks handing power to the Tories.

issues.environment: Cut Camden's carbon emissions by 40% by 2020.

housing.content: Stop selling council housing to property speculators and end the privatisation of caretakers.

quotes.text: SAME OLD TORIES SAY: 'YOU’RE ON YOUR OWN' SCHOOLS, HOSPITALS AND HOMES UNDER THREAT FROM TORY PLANS
"I HATE BRITISH JOBS BEING LOST. YOU NEED TO BE CUTS, CUTS THAT ARE SAVAGE."
